quest.name: Safety Is No Accident
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol is on the lookout for uncommonly sturdy tools for uncommonly dangerous tasks.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine slabs of splendid dense iron ore in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the slabs of splendid dense iron ore to Qhoterl PasolGather bunches of splendid roots in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the bunches of splendid roots to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid diamondtongue at Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid diamondtongue to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: As we dig deeper underground, we encounter ever more boulders obstructing our path. We must now refine our tools─reinforce them to withstand these harsh environs and those harsher still to come. I'd owe you a great debt indeed if you were to aid me in gathering the materials I need to do so.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: In the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta you can mine a splendid dense iron ore, which should do nicely in improving our pickaxes. Take care, however, as you may find things more vicious than rocks barring your way!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: In the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta you can find bunches of sturdy roots, which should come in handy when we have to haul material out of the caves. Take care, however, as you may find things more vicious than rocks barring your way!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: In the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta you can catch the diamondtongue, whose scales can withstand the most extreme elemental stresses. Take care, however, as you may find things more vicious than rocks barring your way!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Remember, I need some of that oh-so-splendid dense iron ore from Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Safe mining, my friend!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Remember, I need a bunch of roots from the floor of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Safe gathering, my friend!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Remember, I need a diamondtongue from the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. I pray you don't fish up something you shouldn't have!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, it's good to see you returned! Seeing as you have all your limbs and various extremities, I take it you were able to obtain the items I requested?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Splendid! With ore of this quality, I'll be able to construct pickaxes that are nigh indestructible─I daresay they'll last longer than our expedition will!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Splendid! These sturdy roots will make the perfect rope─strong enough to withstand the weight of even the most enormous boulders.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Splendid! The scales of the diamondtongue are as enchanting as they are robust. With these I can make boots that will let us traverse the most rugged terrain with ease.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: These new tools will ensure that our younglings survive to dig well until their twilight years, should the need arise─perhaps they'll even pass them down to their children!
